name: Scissors Paper Rock Lizard Spock (Andrew Towell)
name_original: Scissors Paper Rock Lizard Spock (Andrew Towell)
description:
A gamified take on the variation of scissors paper rock seen on Big Bang Theory. Instead of playing with a friend, watch the 5 different types struggle to beat all others!

Key(s)FunctionFFullscreenRResetP or SPACEPause"," or ESCQuit
